title: LF Silver Players to duo (Aim for Gold)
body:
Add my account Kairin{{champion:245}} 

Hey just looking for a team of players who are looking to have some fun and some occasions play serious to get the win in dynamic queue.

Right now i am just playing norms and trying to adapt new champions into my kit and hopefully try and put them into good use also i can play other roles just as well and i have one main for each role but can utilize into each position.
Add my account Kairin
